column4: Ubuntu server 11.10 will not allow me to log on - I type my username and password at console, it shows Welcome to Ubunto and then kicks me right back to a login prompt. Booted with Live CD and mounted / . What should I look at next?
can you login to one of the text-based ttys ?
so can you login as root?
you really should be in #ubuntu-server .. i assumed you are on desktop since you are on this channel
